publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2399 Stuart McMillan: Sail Clyde Strategy Launchâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish Enterprise Sail Clyde Steering Group on the launch of its new strategy, which is to take place on Friday 29 August 2008 in Largs; notes that Sail Clyde is a business development strategy to stimulate expansion of the marine leisure industry and improve facilities for recreational boating in the Firth of Clyde; further notes that Sail Clyde aims to double the number of yachts and motor cruisers on the Clyde in the next decade and to increase significantly marine tourism and marine business of all kinds, and acknowledges that implementing this strategy will help provide more money and jobs in the local economy. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Kidd*, Bashir Ahmad*, Alasdair Allan*, Brian Adam*
S3M-2399Sail Clyde Strategy Launch (lodged on 14 August 2008) Aileen Campbell*, Jamie Hepburn*
